name: 100 Trials
summary:
100 Trials is an awesome action adventure game with a series of 100 unique, fiendishly crafted combat puzzles designed to test your fighting and strategy skills. Ultimately, your four heroes will wind their way though each Trial to succeed in their quest of capturing the "Last Wild Satan". 
 
Fight your way through a mixture of Knights, Robots, Bullies, Bandits and even trade blows with the "Rat King". You muster your defense using everything from throwing knives and handguns to wands, arrows and hand grenades. Your four heroes will master the mazes with touches of magical skills and a dash of humor, rounding out a game with a lot of replay worthiness.
